trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage> event contains a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> collection which contains the warnings sent from the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>이벤트에 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection>서버에서 보낸 경고를 포함 하는 컬렉션.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlErrorCollection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage> event is generated when a SQL Server message with a severity level of 10 or less occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>SQL Server 메시지 심각도 10 이하인 발생할 때 이벤트가 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the server.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 전송 된 경고의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection of warnings sent from the server.
Gets the full text of the error sent from the database.
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스에서 보낸 오류의 전체 텍스트를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이에 대 한 래퍼는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A>첫 번째 속성 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>에 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full text of the error.
Gets the name of the object that generated the error.
trans-unit.target: 오류를 생성 하는 개체의 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이에 대 한 래퍼는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A>첫 번째 속성 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError>에 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlError.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the object that generated the error.
Retrieves a string representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.InfoMessage"></xref> event.
